system.description: Effect: If the target has the @Affliction[drowsy] or @Affliction[nightmares] condition, this Attack's Power doubles and the target is cured of @Affliction[drowsy] or @Affliction[nightmares] on hit, with the target gaining @Affliction[flinched] 5.

actions.name: Wake-Up Slap
actions.description: Effect: If the target has the @Affliction[drowsy] or @Affliction[nightmares] condition, this Attack's Power doubles and the target is cured of @Affliction[drowsy] or @Affliction[nightmares] on hit, with the target gaining @Affliction[flinched] 5.
